.. _prob_output_layer:

Probabilistic output layer
==========================

We support a :ref:`classification probabilistic output layer <prob_output_layer_classification>` for classification
and a :ref:`regression probabilistic output layer <prob_output_layer_regression>` for regression.
Please find their references below.

.. automodule:: fortuna.prob_output_layer.base

.. _prob_output_layer_classification:

.. automodule:: fortuna.prob_output_layer.classification

.. _prob_output_layer_regression:

.. automodule:: fortuna.prob_output_layer.regression
